definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: Other Russian churches also have flame-shaped domes.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯其它教堂也有这种火焰状的圆屋顶。

sentences.english: The sun transform the gild cupola into dazzling point of light.
sentences.chinese: 太阳将这些镀金的圆屋顶变成了闪耀的光点。

sentences.english: He saw the round rooves of the towers.
sentences.chinese: 他看到了一座塔的圆屋顶。

sentences.english: A hole on the dome: a dove in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 圆屋顶上有个洞，洞里有只鸽子。

sentences.english: We lived under a dome at the bottom of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在海底的一个圆屋顶下。

sentences.english: Other Russian churches also have flame-shaped domes.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯其它教堂也有火焰状的圆屋顶。

sentences.english: So the domes of complicated system are appearing from the skies.
sentences.chinese: 像圆屋顶一样复杂的系统从天空出现。
类似于穹隆或圆屋顶的结构或物体。

sentences.english: Quincy Market dome, Faneuil Hall Marketplace. Boston, Massachussets, USA.
sentences.chinese: 昆西市场圆屋顶，法纳尔集市门厅。

sentences.english: The chestnut was in flower and the bells rang out high clear over her gables and cupola.
sentences.chinese: 栗树开花，钟声清晰地高高飘过山墙和圆屋顶。

sentences.english: Lamella domes and vaults consist of inter-connecting steel or aluminium units.
sentences.chinese: 薄片圆屋顶和地下室由连结之间的钢或者铝单位组成。

definition: triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)
